casebody.data:
DAUGHTRIDGE
v.
TANAGER LAND, LLC 325A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Ronald H. Garber, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Daughtridge, Albert S. (Jr.), et al. Charles S. Rountree, III, Attorney at Law, for Tanager Land, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of November 2018 by Defendant to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
